website_summaries.verdict: A great option for a liquid collagen tablet focused on good skin health and revitalization.
pros: Container comes with a unique blend of collagen and antioxidant ingredients for general skin care and health
Helps to replenish key nutrients from natural sources the body needs
cons: Can affect the taste of water and other beverages when mixed together

customer_reviews.title: Love the benefits
customer_reviews.text: This product is incredible. After one month of use, my hair was so much thicker. The most incredible things after using this product for one year is people commenting on my youthful appearance and energy.
customer_reviews.author: doris christopher

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy from this
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product from Walgreens. It's very different tastes. The products are damaging boxes and expiration date very close. Don't buy from this.
customer_reviews.author: TRUC PHAN

customer_reviews.title: Not for the faint of heart
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t get past the taste - made me gag. My stomach is still reeling from this as writing this review. If you’re someone that can down a 16 oz bottle of something that has benefits, you would likely be fine. It has a VERY vitamin-y taste to it. I just couldn’t do it.
customer_reviews.author: MDH

My face is softer and my forehead is smooth and the deep wrinkle I had there have almost disappeared. I will definitely continue to drink this daily

Also I love the flavor!!

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, too pricey

I do think that it has helped with my hair (less shedding) and skin, but the current price (for 10 servings) is almost 3 times what I've paid for 3 boxes of 10 in the past. I know that there are better products out there for the current price, so I think I'll switch to one of those products. The price inconsistency isn't worth it for me.

product_meta.title: Applied Nutrition Liquid Collagen Skin Revitalization, 10 Count 3.35 Fl Ounce
product_meta.description: Applied Nutrition Liquid collagen skin revitalization, strawberry and kiwi flavored, a full 4000 mg to help replenish the body's supply of collagen. Biotin, the essential super beauty nutrient. A combination of super fruits and green tea extract to protect the skin from damaging effects of free radicals. Collagen the secret to youthful looking skin protein makes up nearly 80% of skin and provides structure, elasticity and protection, while helping to retain moisture within the deep Dermal layers.
feature_bullets: A full 4000 mg to help replenish the body's supply of collagen
Biotin, the essential super beauty nutrient
A combination of super fruits and green tea extract to protect the skin from damaging effects of free radicals
Mix one concentrated liquid-tube into 16oz of water per day

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
